name: Date
desc: A specific point in time, independent of any calendar or time zone.

items.name: timeIntervalSince
items.desc: Returns the interval between the receiver and another given date.

items.name: timeIntervalSinceNow
items.desc: The time interval between the date value and the current date and time.

items.name: timeIntervalSinceReferenceDate
items.desc: The interval between the date value and 00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 2001.

items.name: timeIntervalSince1970
items.desc: The interval between the date value and 00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970.

items.name: description
items.desc: A textual description of the date value.

items.name: description
items.desc: Returns a string representation of the date using the given locale.

items.name: debugDescription
items.desc: A textual description of the date suitable for debugging.

items.name: customMirror
items.desc: A mirror that reflects the date.

items.name: hashValue
items.desc: The computed hash value of the date.

items.name: customPlaygroundQuickLook
items.desc: A custom playground Quick Look for the date.

items.name: addTimeInterval
items.desc: Adds a time interval to this date.

items.name: addingTimeInterval
items.desc: Creates a new date value by adding a time interval to this date.
